oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ROBUST-CONTROL OF HIGH-ORDER OSCILLATIONS IN CONTINUOUS ISOTHERMAL CRYSTALLIZERS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CHIDAMBARAM, M
MALLESWARARAO, YSN
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: crystallizer

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A novel method for the design of a robust nonlinear feedback controller is presented for control of high-order oscillations in continuous isothermal crystallisers. The manipulative variable is the nuclei destruction or seeding and the controlled variable is the number moment. Simulation results show that the control system is robust to modelling errors and to disturbances occurring in the system.
